languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт сжимает клинок в руке — и тут же болезненно морщится, касаясь камня душ: кристалл сочится красным сиянием. На лице рейнджера написана мука.{/n} "Страдания... переполняют меня... довольно, я больше не выдержу!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт сжимает клинок в руке — и тут же болезненно морщится, касаясь камня душ: кристалл сочится красным сиянием. На лице рейнджера написала мука.{/n} "Страдания... переполняют меня... довольно, я больше не выдержу!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet grips the blade in her hand and immediately winces. Her spirit stone is emanating a red glow. She touches it with an expression of anguish.{/n} "The suffering... overwhelms me... No more! I cannot bear it any longer!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт сжимает клинок в руке — и тут же болезненно морщится, касаясь камня душ: кристалл сочится красным сиянием. На лице рейнджера написана мука.{/n} "Страдания... переполняют меня... довольно, я больше не выдержу!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet grips the blade in her hand and immediately winces. Her spirit stone is bleeding with red glow. She touches it with an expression of anguish.{/n} "The suffering... overwhelms me... No more! I cannot bear it any longer!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet grips the blade in her hand and immediately winces. Her spirit stone is bleeding with red glow. She touches it with an expression of anguish.{/n} "The suffering... overwhelms me... No more! I cannot bear it any longer!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet grips the blade in her hand and immediately winces. Her spirit stone is emanating a red glow. She touches it with an expression of anguish.{/n} "The suffering... overwhelms me... No more! I cannot bear it any longer!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet grips the blade in her hand and immediately winces. Her spirit stone is emanating a red glow. She touches it with an expression of anguish.{/n} "The suffering... overwhelms me... No more! I cannot bear it any longer!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは刃を手にすると、すぐにうずくまった。彼女の魂縛石は赤い光を放っている。彼女は苦悶の表情でそれに触れる。{/n}「苦しみに…押しつぶされてしまいそう…もうたくさん！これ以上は耐えられない！」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet grips the blade in her hand and immediately winces. Her spirit stone is emanating a red glow. She touches it with an expression of anguish.{/n} "The suffering... overwhelms me... No more! I cannot bear it any longer!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは刃を手にすると、すぐにうずくまった。彼女の魂縛石は赤い光を放っている。彼女は苦悶の表情でそれに触れる。{/n}「苦しみに…押しつぶされてしまいそう…もうたくさん！これ以上は耐えられない！」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}握着刀的伊莉耶特听了这些话，立刻畏缩起来，灵魂石闪烁着血红色的光芒。她带着痛苦的表情触摸着灵魂石。{/n}“痛苦……吞没了我……到此为止吧！我再也受不了了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet grips the blade in her hand and immediately winces. Her spirit stone is emanating a red glow. She touches it with an expression of anguish.{/n} "The suffering... overwhelms me... No more! I cannot bear it any longer!"

traits.locale_text: {n}握着刀的伊莉耶特听了这些话，立刻畏缩起来，灵魂石闪烁着血红色的光芒。她带着痛苦的表情触摸着灵魂石。{/n}“痛苦……吞没了我……到此为止吧！我再也受不了了！”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet agarra con fuerza la cuchilla y hace una mueca. Su joya espiritual desprende un resplandor rojo. La toca con una expresión de angustia.{/n} «El sufrimiento... me supera... ¡Ya basta! ¡No puedo soportarlo más!».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet grips the blade in her hand and immediately winces. Her spirit stone is emanating a red glow. She touches it with an expression of anguish.{/n} "The suffering... overwhelms me... No more! I cannot bear it any longer!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet agarra con fuerza la cuchilla y hace una mueca. Su joya espiritual sangra con un resplandor rojo. La toca con una expresión de angustia.{/n} «El sufrimiento... me supera... ¡Ya basta! ¡No puedo soportarlo más!».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet umschließt die Klinge mit der Hand und verzieht sofort das Gesicht. Ihr Seelenstein leuchtet rot auf. Sie berührt sie mit gequälter Miene erneut.{/n} "Das Leid ... überwältigt mich ... Schluss! Ich ertrage es nicht länger!"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet grips the blade in her hand and immediately winces. Her spirit stone is emanating a red glow. She touches it with an expression of anguish.{/n} "The suffering... overwhelms me... No more! I cannot bear it any longer!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet umschließt die Klinge mit der Hand und verzieht sofort das Gesicht. Ihr Seelenstein leuchtet rot. Sie berührt sie mit gequälter Miene erneut.{/n} "Das Leid ... überwältigt mich ... Schluss! Ich ertrage es nicht länger!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet resserre son emprise sur la lame dans sa main et tressaille. Visiblement angoissée, elle effleure sa pierre-esprit qui rayonne d'une lumière rouge sang.{/n} « La souffrance... me submerge... Assez ! Je n'en supporterai pas plus ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet grips the blade in her hand and immediately winces. Her spirit stone is emanating a red glow. She touches it with an expression of anguish.{/n} "The suffering... overwhelms me... No more! I cannot bear it any longer!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet resserre son emprise sur la lame dans sa main et tressaille. Visiblement angoissée, elle effleure sa pierre-esprit rayonnant d'une lumière rouge sang.{/n} « La souffrance... me submerge... Assez ! Je n'en supporterai pas plus ! »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, elindeki bıçağı sıkıca kavrayıp yüzünü ekşitiyor. Ruh taşından kırmızı bir ışıltı yayılıyor. Yüzünde kederli bir ifadeyle taşa dokunuyor.{/n} "Bu ızdırap... Dayanılacak gibi değil... Yeter! Daha fazla katlanamıyorum!"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet grips the blade in her hand and immediately winces. Her spirit stone is emanating a red glow. She touches it with an expression of anguish.{/n} "The suffering... overwhelms me... No more! I cannot bear it any longer!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet elindeki bıçağı sıkıca tutar tutmaz yüzünü ekşitiyor. Ruh taşından kırmızı bir ışıltı yayılıyor. Yüzünde kederli bir ifadeyle taşa dokunuyor.{/n} "Bu ızdırap... Dayanılacak gibi değil... Yeter! Daha fazla katlanamıyorum!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
